name: mplus Font License
description: The Mplus font licence enables users to confidently and easily incorporate the typeface into a variety of projects, both personal and professional.It is an adaptable and stylish font that has become more well-liked among designers and other creatives around the world.
body: These fonts are free softwares. Unlimited permission is granted to use, copy, and distribute it, with or without modification, either commercially and noncommercially. THESE FONTS ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY.
